casebody.data:
NEWARK UNIFIED SCHOOL DISTRICT
v.
S.C. (Brazil). No. S229112. Supreme Court of California May 11, 2016.

CANTIL-SAKAUYE, C.J., WERDEGAR, CHIN, CORRIGAN, LIU, CUÉLLAR, and KRUGER, JJ., concur.

**552Dismissed and remanded to CA 1/1. Review in the above captioned matter, which **553was granted and held for Ardon v. City of Los Angeles (2016) 62 Cal.4th 1176, 199 Cal.Rptr.3d 743, 366 P.3d 996, is hereby dismissed. (Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.528(b)(1).) The opinion in this case is to remain published.
